title: Radiant Gold & Diamond Kada Set - Contemporary Vaalai
features: Modern Kada design with a classic twist. Features a rope-like gold texture interspersed with dazzling round cut diamonds in bezel settings. The design provides a comfortable fit and showcases the brilliance of the diamonds against the warm gold tone.
colors: Yellow Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: Ideal for festive occasions like Sankranthi
weddings (as part of the bride's jewelry set)
or upscale social gatherings. Can also be worn as a stylish everyday accessory.
